Service Details: - Annual, free community festival held in Kelowna’s Cultural District, Prospera Place and Waterfront Park for residents and visitors to celebrate our nation’s birthday- Festival programming is diverse, multi-generational, and family-friendly with activities and performances that engage festival goers from morning to night
